existing_features.title: Move the admin panel link from the main navigation to a subtle, fixed position in the bottom-right corner of the website that is visible but not prominent
Style the bottom corner admin access element to be discreet - use minimal visual emphasis such as small icon size, reduced opacity, or subtle coloring that blends with the page footer area

new_feature_requests.summary: Move admin panel to bottom corner of website, make it subtle/hidden but still visible

projectName: Move admin panel to subtle bottom corner access
